content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.b: The yields: ever lower. The work: ever harder. The pay? What? Get back to work before I thrash you!
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.s: Your bed was in the stable. Neigh.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.k: Your bed was in the kennel. Woof.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.f: Your bed was in the field. Moo.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.b: Your bed was in the barn. Hoot.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.v: Your bed was in the village. Hope you can afford rent.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.w: -d2 incoming damage, tier 1 (Can move through mud, muck and other awful ground unchallenged)
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.h: A cynical hatred of landowners (DR10 when attacking the rich, this includes rhetorically).
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.b: A stash of books from the master's library.
A rare bottle of fine brandy.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.l: Letters proving you are the son of a wealthy noble.
content.raptorshadow.desperateFarmhand.s: A herd of 6 sheep (they refuse your instructions, shit everywhere, and bleat incessantly; but they will get in the way of any killing blow against you or your companions).
